content: I don't have access to information in real-time or up-to-date news; however, rome is a city with a rich history, and new historical landmarks and artifacts are constantly being discovered in the city. one such recent discovery came in 2018 when archaeologists discovered an intact 2,000-year-old sarcophagus containing the remains of a middle-aged woman in the city center. another exciting discovery took place in january 2021 when italian authorities announced that they had unearthed a rare roman sarcophagus from a luxury villa on the outskirts of the city. these exciting finds highlight the continued importance of rome as an archaeological and historical site.
